Stupid title .. Windows Xp For PSP

You would have to be crazy to download this. First ask yourself how did they get access to Microsoft's source code? Second, how could they take massively bloated software and get it to run on a little PSP in 1MB? That ability alone would be worth a fortune. Third... how did they get port a x86 CPU OS to a MIPS CPU? These guys would have to be the greatest coders of all time.

I can confirm that this is NOT any virus or a trojan as 1 person put. This is like a web page with features which emulate Windows XP. As someone said about getting source code they obviously don't know what they are talking about. There is no need for source code... It isn't an operating system as such. And it is so small because it is only an offline web page with direct links to features. I really hate it when people come across minor errors and automatically presume it must be a virus. I scaned this using AVG, Norton and AD Aware SE. It is not a virus and contains no spyware or adware.
